00002 #include <process/process.h>
00003 #include <process/message.h>
00004 #include <messages/messages.h>
00005 #include <debug/debug.h>

00007 extern process_t* get_current_process();
00008 extern process_t* scheduler_return_process();
00009 
00010 process_t* systemIdlePtr = 0;
00011 process_t* systemProcPtr = 0;
00012 
00013 void systemIdleProcess()
00014 {
00015         systemIdlePtr = get_current_process();
00016 
00017         for (;;)
00018         {
00019                 //Halt the processor tell the next interrupt
00020                 asm volatile("hlt");
00021         }
00022 }
00023 
00024 void systemMainProcess()
00025 {
00026         systemProcPtr = get_current_process();
00027 
00028         int schedulerIter = 0;
00029         process_t* schedulerPtr = 0;
00030         int numNonSystem = 0;
00031 
00032         //Loop and continually halt the processor, this will cause the processor to idle between interrupts
00033         for (;;) {
00034 
00035                 //Check all messages
00036                 while (1)
00037                 {
00038                         //Grab the top message
00039                         process_message pb_top = postbox_top(&get_current_process()->m_processPostbox);
00040 
00041                         if (pb_top.ID != -1)
00042                         {
00043                                 //Its a message to be handled
00044 
00045                         
00046                         }
00047                         else
00048                         {
00049                                 break;
00050                         }
00051 
00052                 }
00053 
00054                 numNonSystem = 0;
00055 
00056                 schedulerIter = 0;
00057                 //Shut down all processes that need a-killin
00058                 while (1)
00059                 {
00060                         schedulerPtr = scheduler_return_process(schedulerIter);
00061 
00062                         if (schedulerPtr == 0)
00063                         {
00064                                 break;
00065                         }
00066                         else if (schedulerPtr->m_shouldDestroy == 1)
00067                         {
00068                                 //Must remove this process and kill it! so disable interrupts don't wanna be interrupted
00069                                 disable_interrupts();
00070 
00071                                 if ((schedulerPtr == systemIdlePtr) || (schedulerPtr == systemProcPtr))
00072                                 {
00073                                         DEBUG_PRINT("Cannot close SystemIdle or System\n");
00074                                         schedulerPtr->m_shouldDestroy = 0;
00075                                 }
00076                                 else
00077                                 {
00078                                         DEBUG_PRINT("Process %i (%s) terminated with return value %i\n", schedulerPtr->m_ID, schedulerPtr->m_Name, schedulerPtr->m_returnValue);
00079 
00080                                         scheduler_remove(schedulerPtr);
00081 
00082                                         DEBUG_PRINT("Freeing process %x (%i:%s) current process %i\n", schedulerPtr, schedulerPtr->m_ID, schedulerPtr->m_Name, get_current_process()->m_ID);
00083                                         freeProcess(schedulerPtr);
00084 
00085                                 }
00086 
00087                                 //Enable interrupts once the deed is done
00088                                 enable_interrupts();
00089                         }
00090                         else
00091                         {
00092                         }
00093 
00094                         //Count up the number of non system processes (To check there is a interface active)
00095                         if ((schedulerPtr != systemIdlePtr) && (schedulerPtr != systemProcPtr))
00096                         {
00097                                 numNonSystem++;
00098                         }
00099 
00100                         schedulerIter++;
00101                 }
00102 
00103                 //If this is the last process alive?
00104                 if (numNonSystem == 0)
00105                 {
00106                         disable_interrupts();
00107 
00108                         printf("Creating new instance of Line\n");
00109 
00110                         createNewProcess("./system/root/Line", init_vfs());
00111 
00112                         enable_interrupts();
00113                 }
00114 
00115                 //Sleep the current process
00116                 scheduler_block_me();
00117         }
00118 }
00119 
00120 void systemProcess()
00121 {
00122     //Disable interrupts while forking
00123     disable_interrupts();
00124 
00125     int forkedID = kfork();
00126     
00127     //Enable them once the processes are set up
00128     enable_interrupts();
00129 
00130     if (forkedID == 1)
00131     {
00132         set_process_name(get_current_process(), "System");
00133         systemMainProcess();
00134     }
00135     else
00136     {
00137         set_process_name(get_current_process(), "SystemIdle");
00138         systemIdleProcess();
00139     }
00140 
00141 }
